MSG.iHereBy: I here by provide my voluntary consent to Bank of India to use the Aadhaar details provided by me for authentication and agree to terms and conditions related to Aadhaar consent and updation.
MSG.imAware: I am aware that there are various alternate actions provided by Bank of India for establishing my identity/address proof for opening a Savings Account and agree to confirm that for opening the online Saving Account variant i.e. the Saving Account. I have voluntarily submitted my Aadhaar number to the bank and hereby give my consent to the bank.
MSG.toEstablish: To establish my identity / Address proof and verify my mobile number by Aadhaar based authentication system through biometric and/or one time pin (OTP) and/or Yes/No Authentication and/or any other authentication mechanism. Independently or verify the genuineness of Aadhaar through quick response (QR) Core or through such other manner as set out by UIDAI or any other law from time to time.
MSG.shareMyAadhaar: Share my Aadhaar detail with UIDAI, NPCI, concerned regulatory or statutory authorities be required under applicable laws.
MSG.toCollect: To collect, store and use the Aadhaar details for the aforesaid purpose(s) and update my number registered with UIDAI in the bank record for sending SMS alerts/other communications to me.
MSG.authVerification: I here by also agree to the below terms pertaining to Aadhaar based authentication/Verification.
MSG.uidai: I have been informed that (a) Upon authentication, UIDAI may share with Bank of India information on the nature of my demographic information, including photographs, mobile number which bank of India may rise an identity/address proof for the purpose of account opening. (b) My Aadhaar detail (including my demographic information) shared by UIDAI will not be used for any purpose other than the purpose mentioned above or as per requirements of law, (c) My biometric information will not be stored by the bank.
MSG.completeRespects: I Hereby declare that all the above information voluntarily furnished by me is true. Correct and complete in all respects.
MSG.openFormalities: I understand that bank of India shall be relying upon the information received from UIDAI for processing my savings account opening formalities.

MSG.AadhaarConsent1: I am aware that submission of Aadhaar is not mandatory, and I have voluntarily opted and give consent for Aadhaar OVD KYC or e-KYC or offline verification instead of other alternative option available for KYC to establish identity including by way of physical KYC with OVD i.e., Officially Valid Documents other than Aadhaar
MSG.AadhaarConsent2: I voluntarily submit my Aadhaar number or Virtual ID or e-Aadhaar or XML or Masked Aadhaar to Bank of India along with details like Name, DOB, gender photo, registered mobile number, email ID, address, Iris authentication details and/or biometric information or  other type of information (collectively, information).
MSG.AadhaarConsent3: I understand that the Aadhaar number and core biometrics will not be stored/ shared except as per law and for CIDR submission. I have downloaded the e-Aadhaar myself using the OTP received on my Aadhaar registered mobile. I will not hold Bank of India or its officials responsible in the event this document is not found to be in order and / or in case of any incorrect information provided by me.
MSG.AadhaarConsent4: I am aware that for e-KYC/authentication/offline verification, Bank will share Aadhaar number and/or biometrics with CIDR/UIDAI, and CIDR/UIDAI will share with Bank, authentication data, Aadhaar data, demographic details, registered mobile number, identity information, which shall be used for the informed purpose mentioned below and I hereby give my irrevocable consent for the same.
MSG.AadhaarConsent5: I authorise and give my consent to Bank of India (and its service providers), for following purposes:
MSG.subAadharConsent1: KYC and periodic KYC process as per the Prevention of Money Laundering Act, 2002 and rules thereunder and / or RBI guidelines, for establishing my identity, carrying out my identification, offline verification or e-KYC or Yes/No authentication/demographic or other authentication/verification/identification as may permitted as per applicable law, for all account, facilities, services, and relationship of/through the Bank, existing and future.
MSG.subAadharConsent2: collecting, sharing, storing, preserving Information, maintaining records, and using the Information and /or authentication/verification/identification records: (a) for the informed purposes above, and /or (b) as well as for regulatory and legal reporting and filings and/or (c) where required under applicable law, rules, regulations:
MSG.subAadharConsent3: enabling my account for Aadhaar enabled Payment Services (PLEPS):
MSG.subAadharConsent4: producing records and logs of the consent, Information, Authentication, identification, verification etc. for evidentiary purposes including before a court of law, any statutory, Regulatory authority or in arbitration.
